name: Compass
author: Raidcore
description: A compass addon, with a UI widget and an in world-compass.

name: ArcDPS
author: deltaconnected
description: combatmetrics

name: World Bosses
author: Sognus.1204
description: Raidcore addon adding meta events and world bosses notifications to in-game map.

name: DVD
author: belst
description: Bouncy

name: Log Uploader
author: belst
description: Program to upload logs to both dps.report and gw2wingman.

name: MouseLookHandler
author: Raidcore
description: Addon to help automatically enable Action Camera and some other tweaks.

name: Addon Config Backup Tool
author: Zyian
description: A small tool to help keep your addons backed up in case of nuking your GW2 install folder

name: Commander's Toolkit
author: Raidcore
description: Allows you to track boon & role coverage in a squad and other features.

name: /gg
author: Raidcore
description: Let's you GG with a button press.

name: Range Indicators
author: Raidcore
description: Shows your hitbox and allows to display custom ranges.

name: Keyboard Overlay
author: Seres67
description: Adds a simple keyboard overlay to the UI.

name: Fast Load
author: Raidcore
description: Lets you load into maps faster.

name: Extended Control Options
author: Jordan
description: Provides additional controls and macros not available via the in-game Control Options menu.

name: Regions of Tyria
author: HeavyMetalPirate.2695
description: Displays the current sector whenever you cross borders, much like your favorite (MMO)RPG does.

name: Log Proofs
author: Subi
description: Displays kill proofs based on logs uploaded to wingman.

name: WvW Toolbox
author: HeavyMetalPirate.2695
description: Tools to enhance your World vs. World experience.

name: Steam Integration
author: Zyian
description: Initializes the Steam API to show you are playing GW2 on Steam to track time played.

name: DRF
author: greaka
description: Gw2 Drop Research Facilities (https://drf.rs) is a live farming tracker to perform drop research without the need of manual counting or waiting for the API to pickup changes.

name: Radial Menus
author: Raidcore
description: Highly customisable radial menus.

name: Castbar Clarity
author: Ideka
description: Add an outline to the castbar.

name: Peace and Quiet
author: Ideka
description: Blacklist those ambient dialogues and voice lines that you never want to hear again.

name: Organizer
author: Heavy Metal Pirate.2695
description: Tools to help you stay organized throughout Tyria.

name: KP Sync
author: lorkanoo
description: Synchronize Killproof automatically

name: Combat Timer
author: Linka
description: Displays the time spent in combat.

name: Reshade Preset Switcher
author: lorkanoo
description: Switch reshade presets automatically

name: Boss Health
author: Raidcore
description: Shows the absolute health value of instanced bosses.

name: MursaatPanel
author: Heavy Metal Pirate.2695
description: Adds a panel that allows you to display various data around your gameplay.

name: CursorAnchor
author: Azrub
description: Centers cursor when toggling action camera

name: WvW Fight Analysis
author: Unreal
description: WvW log analysis tool.

name: FlipMeister
author: Joren.4310
description: Track investments from the trading post. Evon Gnashblade approved!

name: Squad Attendance Taker
author: Vonsh.1427
description: Get formatted list of squad members copied to clipboard on demand

name: Female Human Idle
author: Ideka
description: Restore the old deleted female human fidget animations. Act bored during intense story moments.

name: True World Completion
author: Vonsh.1427
description: Seamless display within game map, includes all zones of all expansions and living worlds.

name: Custom Cursors
author: Jordan
description: Customize in-game cursors.

name: Settings Indicator
author: Raidcore
description: Configurable settings indicators.

name: Simple Speedometer
author: Toxxa
description: A lightly customizeable Speedometer and movement-triggered Timer system.

name: RealTime API
author: Raidcore
description: Provides real time data for other addons.

name: VfxDenoiser
author: Haskha
description: Removes combat visual noise.

name: Transparent Heart Progress
author: Vonsh.1427
description: Detailed display of renown heart progression

name: Item Detail Popups
author: lorkanoo
description: Contextual popups with item details for hovered items. Check prices, browse wiki, preview decorations in game.

name: TaimiHUD
author: The TaimiHUD Team
description: Timers, Commander's Markers and Pathing.

name: GolemHelper
author: Azrub
description: Automates the process of setting optimal boon and golem configurations in the training area.

name: Emotes
author: belst
description: Displays 7tv Emotes mentioned in squadchat. Requires arcdps + unofficial extras

name: Events: Alerts
author: Vonsh.1427
description: Provides game's alerts as events for other addons.
